TEXT: The Justicar utilizes two special types of cards [#94bdff]Holy[] and [#fe513a]Primal.[]
[#fe513a]Primal.[] cards will generate #yVigor equal to the amount of [E] spent to play them.
[#94bdff]Holy[] cards by contrast generate #ySacrifice equal to [E] spent playing them, which once #b10 is obtained will increase damage and block gain of Holy cards by #b1

TEXT: The Justicar's deity is always watching, [#548dff]Blessing[] cards when played create a Divine eye that watches silently intil tribute is payed
Taking damage during your turn will reduce the tribute value, once this value reaches #b0 the Seal breaks and the [#548dff]Blessings[] effect occurs.
If no tribute is made while a Seal is active each turn, at the end of your turn you will lose #b2 HP.
